headline: Governors DeWine, Newsom place Super Bowl wager
author: Pomeroy Daily Sentinel
sentences: LOS ANGELES, Calif. — Ohio Governor Mike DeWine and California Governor Gavin Newsom have placed a friendly wager ahead of Super Bowl LVI, featuring the AFC Champion Cincinnati Bengals and the NFC Champion Los Angeles Rams, according to a news release from DeWine’s office.
Governor Newsom has in turn wagered “some of California’s world class agricultural offerings” for a Bengals win.
In addition, Ohio First Lady Fran DeWine will send her Bengals Buckeye Brownies if the wager is paid out.
“Fran and I are so excited by the Bengals’ thrilling playoff run and Super Bowl appearance,” said Gov.
